name: Kawanishi N1K2-J Prototype
description: The Kawanishi N1K2-J Prototype flying over Yokosuka 1944. This is the Platz PDR-2 kit in 1:144 with a pilot improvised from a Yamada Kagaku figure.
categories: Aircraft - military, Japan, IJN, Platz, Yamada Kagaku

name: BOAC Boeing 314A Clipper
description: Building the Airfix 1:144 Vintage Classic kit of the Boeing 314 Clipper, in the livery of BOAC 1941.

name: Gloster Javelin FAW.9R
description: Building the Airfix 1:48 Gloster Javelin FAW.9R (XH893) transferred to 64 Squadron in 1965 and based at RAF Tengah

name: Aichi E11A
description: Building and motorising the Aichi E11A Type 98 Reconnaissance Seaplane, using the 2020 release of the Fujimi 1:72 kit.

name: Confrontation On Tarawa
description: Battle of Tarawa, 1943: US Marines land on Betio and engage forces including the 7th Sasebo Special Naval Landing Force that fight virtually to the last man. A scene with 1:35 figures from Master Box.
categories: Figures, Japan, IJN, USMC, Master Box

name: Subaru 360 Young-SS
description: Building the Hasegawa 1:24 kit of the Subaru 360 Young-SS with figure.

name: IJN Tugger Set
description: Building the Water Line Series 509 IJN Tugger Set in 1:700. I am sure these will be deployed for various dioramas in the future!
categories: Ships - military, Japan, IJN, Tamiya, Hasegawa, Aoshima

name: Fairey Flycatcher
description: Building the Fairey Flycatcher stationed at HMS Hermes, China Station, 1930. This is the Armory Models Group kit in 1:48, with a hand carved prop and wood decals from Proper Plane of Ukraine. All upstaged by a couple of cheeky seagulls.

name: IJN Matsu-class Destroyer Sakura
description: Building the Matsu-class Destroyer Sakura (桜) from Fujimi in 1:700 scale with a few upgrades (replaced some of the equipment with better moldings, fixed the stern profile).
categories: Ships - military, Japan, IJN, Destroyer, Fujimi

name: FM-2 Wildcat
description: Building the FM-2 Wildcat from Sweet in 1:144, converted for in-flight with motorized propeller

name: Soviet 85mm D-44 Divisional Gun
description: The D-44 was introduced late in WWII and has been put into service by many countries in wars since then, up to and including both sides in the Russian invasion of Ukraine. This build is intended for a future diorama.

name: Bedford QLT and QLD Trucks
description: Building the Airfix 1:76 Bedford QLT and QLD Trucks, kit A03306. Just the vehicles themselves right now - they'll likely end up in a diorama one day.

name: Yokosuka D4Y2 Suisei
description: Building the Micro Ace 1:72 boxing of the Yokosuka D4Y2 Suisei Model 12 (彗星一二型)
categories: Aircraft - military, Japan, IJN, Micro Ace

name: Leopard 2A6 Armed Forces of Ukraine
description: Building the ICM 1:72 model of the Leopard 2A6 deployed with the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

name: Out Fishing - Target Fixation
description: Spare Green Max 1:150 Fishing Boat? Time for a whimsical little diorama.

name: Armored Trooper VOTOMS Scope Dog
description: Building the Armored Trooper VOTOMS Scope Dog in a diorama featuring Fyana (フィアナ) contemplating life, the universe, and everything.

name: Brewster Buffalo
description: Building the Brewster Buffalo on a jungle raid over Burma, early 1942. This is the Airfix 1:72 vintage classic kit A02050V.

name: Mitsubishi Ki-15-II
description: Building the ARII 1:72 kit of the Mitsubishi Ki-15-II in IJA service.

name: Antarctic Research Ship Sōya
description: Building the 1:700 Foresight model of the Antarctic Research Ship Sōya 宗谷 (PL107)

name: 1967 Jaguar E-Type
description: Building the Airfix 1:43 kit of the Jaguar E-Type

name: Kure Naval Arsenal
description: Building the Fujimi 1:3000 diorama depicting Kure Naval Arsenal

name: Miles Master
description: Building the Dora Wings Miles M.9 Master Mk. I in 1:48 for the Models for Heroes/Model Officers Mess 48x48 Group Build 2025.

name: Luella Bates and the FWD Model B
description: Celebrating the life of Luella Bates, one of the first women to professionally drive and test heavy-duty trucks, paving the way for future generations in transportation and heavy industry. Features the Roden FWD Model B in 1:72.
categories: Vehicles - civil, Vehicles - military, Figures, USA, Roden, Germania Figuren

name: Kawasaki Ki-45 Kai Otsu
description: Building the Kawasaki Ki-45 Kai Otsu Toryu (Nick) as used by the IJA 4th Flight Regiment, based on the Hasegawa 1:72 kit.

name: HMS Repulse
description: Remembering Force Z with a build of the HMS Repulse from the Tamiya 1:700 waterline series.

name: Aichi D3A1 from Akagi
description: An Aichi D3A1 Val dive bomber attack launched from the Akagi. Featuring kits from Airfix and ZTS Plastyk in 1:72

name: Tokyo Model Stores
description: Reviewing the best model stores in Tokyo

name: Homecoming
description: A little vignette featuring figures from ICM and a Lancaster and Spitfires from Pit-Road.

name: Squadron Commander Lord Flasheart
description: Woof! The legend of Squadron Leader The Lord Flasheart. An Elan13 Miniatures bust with a Fokker Dr.1 from Airfix.

name: Bristol F.2b
description: Building the Bristol F.2b in 1:72 scale. This is the venerable Airfix Vintage Classic from 1957!

name: Fokker Dr.I
description: Building the Fokker Dr.I (intended for another diorama). This is the venerable Airfix Vintage Classic from 1957!

name: Foxtrot-class Zaporizhzhia
description: MikroMir have made a very good kit of the Foxtrot-class Zaporizhzhia. The build went well, but my attempt to encase it in resin was a catastrophic failure☹ One day I'll try this again, but in the spirit of sharing failures as well as successes: here's the gory story of what went wrong!

name: Naval Mine Removal
description: Members of the Mine Recovery and Disposal Squad towing away a naval mine from the beach at Tayport with the aid of a Bren gun carrier being operated by troops of the 1st Polish Corps. Features the Airfix Bren Gun Carrier and figures from Germania Figuren.
categories: Vehicles - military, UK, Airfix, Germania Figuren

name: Kyushu J7W1
description: Building the Kyūshū J7W Shinden 震電, as used by Kōichi Shikishima in Godzilla Minus One to deliver the final fatal blow.

name: Mitsubishi G3M3 Nell
description: Building the Mitsubishi G3M3 Nell from Hasegawa in 1:72, motorized and mounted in-flight for the #risingsungb.

name: Gloster Meteor FR.9
description: Building the 1:72 Airfix 2022 tooling of the Gloster Meteor FR.9.

name: Mitsubishi A6M2b
description: Building the classic Tamiya 1:72 A6M2b

name: IJN Seaplane Tender Kamikawa Maru
description: Depicting the brief establishment of a seaplane base at Deboyne in 1942 by the IJN Seaplane Tender Kamikawa Maru and a supporting force.

description: Building the Supermarine Spitfire PR.XIX in 1:72 from the Airfix D-Day Duo kit.

name: Betio
description: Type 95 Ha-Gō on Betio, capturing the aftermath of the battle as depicted in a famous photograph. Uses the IBG Models 1:72 kit.

name: I-16 Escuadrilla de Mosca
description: Building the beautiful ClearProp 1:72 rendering of the Polikarpov I-16 in Spanish Republican Air Force service in the Escuadrilla de Mosca.

name: British Royal Artillery Gunner 1815
description: Posing the Elan13 54mm Royal Artillery Gunner leaping into action...

name: Hongdu K-8/JL-8
description: Building the Hongdu K-8/JL-8 trainer aircraft from the Trumpeter 1:72 kit.

name: キ51 over Burma 1942

name: Kawasaki Ki-100-I-Otsu
description: Building the キ100 from Aoshima in 1:72, mounted in flight over a watercolour scene.

description: Blue Star Lines M.V. Southland Star transiting Cook Strait in a gale

name: Morane Saulnier MS.230
description: Building the Dora Wings Morane Saulnier MS.230 for the 2024 Models for Heroes 48x48 group build.

name: Gloster Gladiator
description: Building the Airfix 1:72 Gloster Gladiator Mk II over St. Inglevert, Northern France, December 1939.

name: Bristol Bulldog
description: The Bristol Bulldog is an RAF classic from the inter-war period. Although this Airfix Vintage Classic 2019 boxing was tooled way back in 1969, it is still a very buildable kit of a very beautiful plane.

name: IJN Heavy Cruiser Tone 利根
description: On 23 January 1942, the IJN Heavy Cruiser Tone 利根 attacked Buka Island with its float planes. A diorama featuring the Aoshima 1:700 kit.

description: HMS Electra (H27) and HMS Express (H61) race to protect HMS Prince of Wales and HMS Repulse as a wave of G3M Nell torpedo bombers press their attack on 10 December 1941.

description: Building the ICM Kawasaki Ki-10 as used by the IJN, based on the ICM 1:72 kit.

description: Building the MikroMir 1:35 kit.

description: Building a SG$5 bargain Fujimi 1:72 kit of the Tachikawa Ki-55 Type 99 Advanced Trainer

description: An heroic pose in a walnut with a figure from the Orion Ukrainian Mounted Cossacks set. No, this is not  meant to be political - but if you come and try to steal my nuts, expect to fight this guy!

description: Building the beautiful candy red G-Fire Spitfire Mk.XIV from Airfix in 1:48 scale.

name: Vauxhall D-Type Ambulance
description: Building the wonderful little 1:72 Vauxhall D-Type Ambulance kit from Ukrainian manufacturer Roden. Dedicated to the memory of Valery Grygorenko. Valery created some of the most amazing box art for Roden but tragically he was killed in a Russian attack near his home in March 2022.

description: An excuse to build another sea base - this time for an aircraft - the RN Blackburn Buccaneer S.2C from Airfix in 1:72 scale, tooling around the North Sea at 30ft.

description: Building the Special Hobby 1:72 CAC Wirraway, as stationed at Seletar in 1941 - just up the road from me

description: Building the Trumpeter 1:72 T-34 Model 1942 with some CMK figures (just practicing weathering at small scale)

name: WyLed

description: a paper model with some LED effects

description: Pimping up the Metal Earth Electric Lead Guitar kit with some sound activated LEDs with electronics squirreled away in an 'amp'
